articles.title: Make-up of gut microbiome may influence COVID-19 severity and immune response - EurekAlert
articles.description: The variety and volume of bacteria in the gut, known as the microbiome, may influence the severity of COVID-19 as well as the magnitude of the immune system response to the infection, suggests research published online in the journal Gut.
